definitions.title: n.f. jar, jug,
definitions.body: of flat or broad shape;—abs. [[חַפַּ֫הַּת]] 1Ki 17:12; cstr. [[חַפָָּחַת]] 1Sa 26:11 +;—jar or jug for water 1Sa 26:11, 1Sa 26:12, 1Sa 26:16, 1Ki 19:6; for oil 1Ki 17:12, 1Ki 17:14, 1Ki 17:16 (on masc. verb. [[חָסֵר]] v. Ew:§ 317 c, but prob. rd. [[חָסֵָרָה]] SS Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 89, cf. v:1Ki 17:14).
